title: Clinical data template to create a listing
description: This report displays a listing of the variables and data of interest, displayed in an interactive table. This table can contains comparison with a previous batch ('comparisonTable' parameters).

templatePackage.doc: package from which the template should be extracted

dataFileName.doc: name of the data file of interest

dataTotalProcessing.doc: data processing parameters for 'dataTotalFileName', passed to \link[clinDataReview]{processData}

tableParams.doc: parameters to create the table, passed to \link[clinDataReview]{tableClinData}

comparisonTableType.doc: output type of the comparison table

comparisonTableParams.doc: parameters for the comparison table, passed to \link[clinUtils]{compareTables}

loopingVar.doc: data variable(s) to loop over, for which each output should be created

loopingNMax.doc: maximum number of elements of \code{loopingVar} to include in the report
